=== About Me ===

Hi, I'm Darrell Little, organizer of the Roanoke Linux Users Group (ROALUG), located in Roanoke, Virginia. I've been 
a Linux user since 1995 when I first starting working with web servers and building sites for myself and others.

=== Contributions ===

In 2015, the first year for ROALUG, we participated in the Global Jam and held two Ubuntu Hour sessions.

* Attended the SouthEast LinuxFest with a table promoting Ubuntu/Linux in amateur radio

* Represented Ubuntu/Linux at the local amateur radio Ham Fest

* Assisted multiple new members of ROALUG to install and use Ubuntu

=== Future Goals ===

Planning now for 2016 and at least two Ubuntu Hour sessions and more involvement with the Global Jam.
Volunteer and assist with the Virginia LoCo group at more events like the SouthEast LinuxFest
